Translations.Text: The believers have succeeded
those who are humble in their prayers
and those who stay away from the useless (acts and talks)
and those who do their mandatory charity
and those who guard their private parts
except with their spouses or what they own, then indeed they are blameless
and anyone who look for beyond this, then they are those who exceed the limits
and those who observe their trusts and their promise
and those who guard their mandatory prayer
they are the inheritors
those who inherit the paradise, remaining in there forever
And We have certainly created the human being from clay’s extract
Then We placed him as a fertilized egg in a safe quarter (the womb)

Then We made the fertilized egg into a (dangling, clinging, and leach like) blood clot, then We made the clot into a (piece of) chewed flesh, then We made the chewed flesh into bones, then We covered the bones with flesh, then We turned it into another creation. So blessed is God, best of the creators
Then you certainly die after that
Then indeed you are raised on the resurrection day
And We have certainly created seven paths/layers (of skies) above you, and We are not neglectful of the creation
And We sent down rain from the sky in proper amount, then We made it settle in the earth, and indeed We are able to take it away
And We produced gardens of date palms and grapes for you with it, and there are plenty of fruits in them that you eat from it
And a tree (of olive) that comes out of Mount Sinai producing oil and sauce/dip for those who eat
And there is a lesson for you in the livestock, We give you drink from what is in their bellies, and there are many other benefits for you in them, and you also eat from them
And you are carried on them and on the ships
And We have certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said: my people, serve God, you have no god other than Him, would you not be cautious

The leaders of those who disbelieved among his people said: he is only a human being like you who wants to be superior over you, and if God wanted He would have sent down angels, we did not hear of this among our forefathers
He is only a man that there is madness in him, so put up with him for a while
He said: my Master, help me because they denied me

So We revealed to him that build the Ark under Our eyes and Our revelation, and when Our command comes and the oven bursts out (with water), then put two of every kind (a male and a female) and your family in it except anyone among them whom the word is already issued against him, and do not talk to me about those who did wrong for they will be drowned
And when you and those with you settle on the Ark, then say: all praise belongs to God, the One who saved us from the wrongdoing people
And say: my Master, make me land in a blessed landing place, you are the best of those who make (people) land
Indeed there are signs in that, and indeed We put (people) to test
Then We gave rise to another generation after them
And We sent them a messenger from among themselves (saying): serve God, you have no god other than Him, would you not be cautious

And the leaders of his people, those who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the hereafter and We made them comfortable in this world’s life said: this is only a human being like you, he eats from what you eat from it and he drinks from what you drink
and if you obey a human being like yourselves, then you are certainly losers
Does he promise you that when you die and you become dust and bones, that you are brought out (and resurrected)
What you are promised is far, far (from the truth)
There is nothing except our life of this world, we die and we live (and world goes on), and we will not be raised
He is only a man that makes up a lie (and attributes it) to God, and we do not believe him
He said: my Master, help me because they denied me
He (God) said: they shall become sorry in a short while
Then the awesome roar rightfully took them, and We made them into debris. So away with the wrongdoing people
Then We gave rise to other generations after them
No community (of faith) gets ahead of its appointed time and they would not delay

Then We sent Our messengers one after the other, every time a messenger came to a community, they denied him. So We made them follow each other (to destruction), and We made them stories (for the others). So away with people who do not believe
Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear reason
to Pharaoh and his assembly, but they acted arrogantly and they were bossy people
They said: should we believe in two human beings like us while their people are our servants
So they denied them both then they became among the destroyed ones
And We have certainly given Moses the book, so that they may be guided
And We made son of Mary and his mother a sign, and we sheltered them both on a hilltop having an accommodation and a spring (of running water)
Messengers, eat from the good things and do good work, indeed I know well what you do
And indeed this is your community, a single community, and I am your Master so be cautious of Me
But they cut up their affair (in the religion) into pieces among them, each party happy with what they had
So leave them in their ignorance for a while
Do they think that what We supplied them with it from wealth and children
We are rushing the goodness for them? No, they do not realize
Indeed those who are fearful of the awe of their Master
and those who believe in their Master’s signs
and those who do not associate (partners) with their Master
and those who give from what they are given, and their hearts trembles that they return to their Master
they rush in (doing) the good and they are pioneers for it
We do not task any person beyond its capability, and there is a book with Us that speaks the truth, and they will not be wronged
No, but their hearts are in ignorance regarding this (truth), and they have works other than that, which they are doers of them
Until when We take their rich ones with the punishment, then they cry out for help
Do not cry out for help today, indeed you will not be helped by Us
My signs had been read to you, but you used to turn back on your heels
Being arrogant about them, talking nonsense (about My signs) in nightly conversation
Did they not think about the word (of Quran), or did something come to them that did not come to their forefathers
Or did they not recognize their messenger, so they rejected him
Or do they say there is madness in him? No, but he brought them the truth, and most of them dislike the truth

And if the truth had followed their desires, then the skies and the earth and everyone in them would have certainly corrupted/perished. No, but We brought them their mention/reminder, but they turn away from their mention/reminder
Or do you ask them for any payment? Payment from your Master is better, and He is best of the providers
And you certainly invite them to a straight path
And indeed those who do not believe in the hereafter are deviators from the (right) path
And if We have mercy on them and remove what is with them from harm, they would persist in their rebellion, blindly wandering
And We have certainly taken them to the punishment, but they did not comply with their Master and they do not humbly plead
Until when We opened a door having a severe punishment for them, then they became hopeless in it
And He is the One who made the ear and the eyes and the hearts for you. You give little thanks
And He is the One who multiplied (and spread) you on the earth, and you will be gathered to Him
And He is the One who gives life and causes death, and the alternation of the night and the day belongs to Him. Do you not understand
No, but they say same as what the earlier ones said
They said: would we be raised when we die and become dust and bones
We and our fathers have certainly been promised this in the past. This is only stories of the earlier ones
Say: to whom belongs the earth and everyone in it, if you knew
They are going to say: God. Say: do you not take notice
Say: who is the Master of the seven skies and the Master of the great throne
They are going to say: God. Say: would you not be cautious
Say: in whose hand is the rule of everything and he shelters and no one is sheltered against him, if you knew
They are going to say: God. Say: so, how are you bewitched
No, but We brought them the truth, and they are certainly liars
God did not take a child and there is no god with Him, in that case every god would take away what it created, and some of them would be superior to others. God is flawless about what they describe
Knower of the unseen and the visible, and He is above what they associate (with Him)
Say: my Master, I wish You would show me what they are promised
My Master, do not make me of the wrongdoing people
And We are certainly able to show you what We promised them
Repel (and respond to) the badness with that which is better. We know better about what they describe
And say: my Master, I look for Your protection from seductions of the devils
and my Master, I look for your protection from their presence
Until when the death comes to one of them, then he says: my Master, send me back
so that I do good work in what I left behind (and neglected). No way, indeed it is only a word that he says it. And there is a barrier behind them until a day they are raised
So when the trumpet is blown, then there is no relationship between them on that day, and they do not ask each other
So those who scales are heavy, then they are the successful ones
And those whose scales are light, then they are those who lost their souls, remaining in hell forever
The fire burns their faces, and they frown in it
Were not My signs being read to you, and you were denying it
They say: our Master, our misery overcame us and we were misguided people
Our Master, bring us out of it, and if we return (to disbelief) then indeed we are wrongdoers
He (God) says: go away, into it and do not talk to Me
Indeed there was a group of My servants saying: our Master, we believed, so forgive us and have mercy on us, and You are the best of the merciful ones
But you took them as a joke (and ridiculed them) and you were laughing at them until they made you forget remembering Me
Indeed I reward them today because of their perseverance (and patience), indeed they are the victors
He (God) says: how many years did you stay in the earth (in the grave)
They say: we stayed for a day or part of a day, so ask those who count
He says: you only stayed a little while, if only you knew
Did you think that We created you uselessly (without a purpose), and you are not returned to Us
God is highest (and above all), the true king, there is no God except Him, the Master of the honorable throne
And whoever calls on another god with God without having any proof for that, then indeed his accounting is with his Master. Indeed the disbelievers do not succeed
And say: my Master, forgive and have mercy, and you are the best of the merciful ones
